liber.edit.client
Class ArchiveOptionsPresenter

java.lang.Object
  PopupPanel
      liber.edit.client.InputPopupPanel
          liber.edit.client.ArchiveOptionsPresenter

public class ArchiveOptionsPresenter
extends InputPopupPanel

Presents existing options in the database; for each option the user can click on 'more' to see an object's complete descriptions in a browsing pane.

Version:
1.3 21 May 2008
Author:
Feikje Hielkema

Constructor Detail

ArchiveOptionsPresenter

public ArchiveOptionsPresenter(String[] options,
                               WYSIWYMinterface parent,
                               ObjectPropertyCommand command,
                               WysiwymTab tab,
                               boolean aut)
Constructor, shows the list of options in a pop-up.

Parameters:
options - String[] options
parent - Entrypoint
command - ObjectPropertyCommand, where the selected option will be used
tab - Parent pane
aut - If false, nothing happens if the user clicks 'no'. If true, a new object will be created if the user clicks 'no'.
Method Detail

onClick

public void onClick(Widget sender)
Click listener. If the user clicks 'help', show the help dialog box; if 'yes', add the selected value to the command; if 'no', tell command to create a new value if automatic is true, otherwise just hide the pop-up.

Parameters:
sender - Widget that was clicked on
